name: Snake River Flight Training Club
about: Snake River Flight Training Club, based in Caldwell, Idaho, is a renowned flight school with over 35 years of experience in aviation training. We pride ourselves on providing personalized instruction from highly experienced instructors who tailor their teaching to each student's needs. Our fleet includes low-time, well-maintained Cessna trainers and a vintage 1947 Stinson with a newly overhauled Franklin engine. We offer a range of courses, from Private Pilot to Commercial Pilot and Flight Instructor certifications. Partnering with industry experts like Rich Stowell, we emphasize skill-building and safety. Our commitment to quality and individual attention sets us apart from larger schools, ensuring our students receive the best possible training. We are dedicated to training good pilots, not just pilots.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Instrument Proficiency Check
Intro Flight
Instrument
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
Multi Engine Instructor MEI
Private Pilot"]
